entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
